Kyu-Hwan Shim

Undergraduate @ Sogang U Computer Science & Engineering.

I am currently serving as a Machine Learning Engineer Intern at Nota AI ITS Team, developing Vision-based Model.

Previously, I co-found and worked as as a Senior Designer at OCONNECT, based on UNIST. My focus of study is aimed at developing AI which enhance and improve human lifestyles. I am dedicated to enhancing my knowledge and skills in Computer Science and Deep Learning, with a particular interest in Application of Langauge Model.
